messages.content: Inform international students about our credit card that offers Scene+ points and cashback.
Need an email that details our credit card's Scene+ points and cashback offers for international students.

Welcome to your new academic home in Canada! Our credit card for international students not only waives the annual fee but also rewards you with up to 7,500 Scene+ points in the first 3 months and offers generous cashback on purchases. It’s crafted to support your lifestyle, from textbooks to travel. With competitive rates and essential financial services, it’s the perfect tool to help manage your expenses while you focus on your studies and explore what Canada has to offer.
Generate an email to introduce credit card offers tailored for international students in Canada.

Settle into your new Canadian life with ease using our International Student Credit Card, offering $0 annual fees, a welcome bonus of up to 7,500 Scene+ points, competitive interest rates, and cashback on essentials. Specially designed to support your academic and personal growth, this card ensures you make the most of your time in Canada. Get started on a journey of financial independence with benefits tailored just for you.

Welcome to Canada! As an international student, unlock your financial freedom with our Scene+ Student Banking Bundle, offering up to $360 in welcome bonuses, 7,500 bonus Scene+ points within the first 3 months, $0 annual fee credit cards with competitive rates, and exclusive cash back on select purchases. Embrace tailored financial management designed for your unique journey. Enhance your student life and secure your future with us. Join our community today and make the most of your studies in Canada.

I'm looking for a rewarding credit card as a new Permanent Resident. What do you suggest?

Explore our no-annual-fee credit card, perfect for Permanent Residents, offering 3X Scene+ points on groceries, dining, and entertainment. Benefit from comprehensive travel and shopping protection, enhancing your experience in Canada.
Describe the travel rewards and shopping protection our credit card offers to Permanent Residents.
Can you recommend a credit card that offers travel rewards and purchase protection?

Our credit card is designed for Permanent Residents, offering lucrative travel rewards for every purchase, enhanced by comprehensive shopping and travel protection. Enjoy these benefits with no annual fee, making your travels and purchases secure.
Inform Permanent Residents about our credit card’s bonus Scene+ points offer.
What special offers do you have for new credit card members?

Maximize your rewards as a Permanent Resident with our credit card, featuring up to 40,000 bonus Scene+ points in the first year. With no foreign transaction fees and a waived annual fee for the first year, it’s an ideal choice for newcomers.
Explain our credit card's flexible payment options to Permanent Residents.

Our credit card offers flexible payment solutions for Permanent Residents, allowing installment plans on purchases over $100 without interest. It's suitable for managing large expenses, with the added benefit of no annual fee for the first year.

It also offers up to 3X Scene+ points on eligible purchases, first-year annual fee waiver, and comprehensive travel protections, maximizing your savings abroad and at home.

I'm a Permanent Resident looking for a credit card that rewards my daily spending. What do you have?

Embrace the joy of everyday moments with our credit card! Earn 5x points on takeout, rideshare, dining, and more, making each purchase a delightful reward. From fueling up at the gas station to picking up groceries, earn points on every $1 spent. Plus, perks for adding users multiply the fun!

Dear Permanent Resident,

From fueling up at the gas station to picking up groceries, earn points on every $1 spent. Plus, perks for adding users multiply the fun! Apply now and start celebrating every spend with us. 

Best regards,

You'll earn bonus points not only on groceries and transit but also on utilities, health and wellness purchases, and more. We understand the challenges of settling into a new country, and our credit card aims to make your financial management as seamless as possible. Enjoy enhanced security features, fraud protection, and 24/7 customer support. We're excited to be a part of your journey in your new home country

Advise on building credit history for new permanent residents interested in rewards credit cards.
How can I start building my credit history as a new permanent resident?

Welcome! As a new permanent resident, building your credit history is crucial. Our rewards credit card is a fantastic start. Tailored for newcomers, it helps establish your credit by reporting to major credit bureaus monthly. Enjoy perks like bonus points on everyday purchases, a generous welcome offer, and no annual fee for the first year. Additionally, access educational resources on credit building, personalized financial advice, and a suite of online tools for tracking your spending and credit score improvements. Embrace your new journey with confidence, knowing we're here to support every step of your financial growth.
Describe a credit card offer focusing on travel rewards for new permanent residents.
I love to travel. Are there any credit card options with travel rewards for someone new to the country?

Absolutely, and welcome to your new adventure! Our travel rewards credit card is designed for globetrotters like you, newly settled in your country. Earn miles on every purchase, with triple points on travel and dining worldwide. The first year's annual fee is waived, and you'll start with a 30,000-mile welcome bonus, enough for a round-trip domestic flight. Benefits include comprehensive travel insurance, no foreign transaction fees, and exclusive access to airport lounges around the globe. Plus, get personalized travel planning services to make your trips even more enjoyable. Embrace the world with open arms, and let your new credit card be your companion on every journey. Further enhancing your travel experience, our card offers special hotel upgrades, late checkouts, and unique cultural experiences at destinations worldwide. Additionally, earn an annual travel credit as a loyalty bonus, making your adventures even more rewarding. Suggest a credit card with family benefits for new permanent residents.
Now that I'm settling in with my family, I'm looking for a credit card that offers benefits for a family. Any suggestions?

Congratulations on your new beginning! For families like yours, our credit card comes packed with features to enrich your collective experiences. With no annual fee for the first year and a dedicated financial advisor to help plan your family's financial future, it's the perfect partner as you embark on this exciting new chapter together. Plus, get peace of mind with our enhanced security features, including real-time fraud monitoring and instant transaction alerts, ensuring your family's finances are always protected.

Detail the benefits of a PC®Mastercard® for foreign workers emphasizing rewards and security features.
